name: Glimmersmith
description:
IT'S SO BUGGY I'M SO SORRY.

So it's currently not possible to get past the first level. I'm working on it!

In addition, the pause menu (and Quit option) never got set up, so you'll have to alt+f4 at that point. That's game jams for you I guess? Thoroughly enjoyed working on this project though, so thanks for the opportunity!

-Louis

You are a dwarven gemsmith in search of treasure! Using magic gems, craft and customise your weapons and constructs. Explore the Glittergold Mines and defend yourself from viciously cute slimes. Craft ridiculously overpowered gem and magic combinations.
